com.digby.localpoint.sdk.core

Interface ILPLocalpointService


  • public interface ILPLocalpointService
    The Location Marketing service is the applications's entry point to Location Marketing functionality.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    2.6.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ILPDevice getDevice()
      Returns the device associated with the Localpoint service.
      ILPLocationProvider getLocationProvider()
      Returns the location provider associated with the Location Marketing service.
      ILPMessageProvider getMessageProvider()
      Returns the message provider associated with the Location Marketing service.
      ILPVersion getSDKVersion()
      Returns the version for the Location Marketing SDK.
      ILPUser getUser()
      Returns the user of the Location Marketing service.
      boolean isBrandEnabled()
      Indicates whether the brand identifier used by this service is enabled.
      void setLocalNotificationListener(ILPLocalNotificationListener listener)
      Registers the local notification listener associated with the Location Marketing service.
      void start()
      Starts the Location Marketing service.
      void stop()
      Stops the Location Marketing service.

    • Method Detail

      • getDevice

        ILPDevice getDevice()
        Returns the device associated with the Localpoint service.

        This method should never return null.

        Returns:
        the device associated with the Localpoint service

      • getUser

        ILPUser getUser()
        Returns the user of the Location Marketing service.

        This method should never return null.

        Returns:
        the user of the Location Marketing service

      • getLocationProvider

        ILPLocationProvider getLocationProvider()
        Returns the location provider associated with the Location Marketing service.

        This method should never return null.

        Returns:
        the location provider associated with the Location Marketing service

      • getMessageProvider

        ILPMessageProvider getMessageProvider()
        Returns the message provider associated with the Location Marketing service.

        This method should never return null.

        Returns:
        the message provider associated with the Location Marketing service

      • getSDKVersion

        ILPVersion getSDKVersion()
        Returns the version for the Location Marketing SDK.

        This method should never return null.

        Returns:
        the version for the Location Marketing SDK

      • isBrandEnabled

        boolean isBrandEnabled()
        Indicates whether the brand identifier used by this service is enabled.
        Returns:
        true if the brand identifier is enabled; false otherwise

      • start

        void start()
        Starts the Location Marketing service.

        Turns on the SDK and puts it into a ready state to begin device registration and start location services. This call has no effect if this service has previously been started.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops the Location Marketing service.

        Turns off the SDK and stops location services. This call has no effect if this service has previously been stopped.

      • setLocalNotificationListener

        void setLocalNotificationListener(ILPLocalNotificationListener listener)
        Registers the local notification listener associated with the Location Marketing service.
        Parameters:
        listener - the local notification listener
